items.sentence: Just staying alive in these times is hard enough.
Venice, Italy is one of the wonders of the world.
Last week I was at the beach, but today I'm home.
It never occurred to me that Tom would get angry.
It never occurred to me that Tom would get upset.
On a hot day, nothing is better than a cold beer.
It would be wise to for you to avoid eating eggs.
It would be wise to leave the decision up to Tom.
It would be wise to pay attention to the details.
I'm sorry I'm late. I couldn't find the bus stop.
